We have hotels in 4 major cities: Okara, Lahore, Sheikhupura, and Multan. Each city offers unique experiences and attractions!
Lahore, the heart of Pakistan! We offer hotels near Badshahi Mosque, Lahore Fort, and Shalimar Gardens. Prices range from PKR 2,000 to PKR 150,000 per night.
Multan, the City of Saints! Visit the famous Tomb of Shah Rukn-e-Alam and enjoy our comfortable accommodations ranging from budget to luxury suites.
Okara offers peaceful stays with easy access to the historic Garrison area. We have budget-friendly to premium rooms available.
Sheikhupura is home to the beautiful Hiran Minar! We offer comfortable accommodations for visitors exploring this historic city.

We offer 10 room categories: Budget (PKR 2K-5K), Economy (5K-10K), Standard (10K-15K), Deluxe (15K-25K), Business (20K-30K), Junior Suite (25K-35K), Executive Suite (35K-50K), Family Suite (30K-45K), Presidential Suite (50K-100K), and Royal Suite (100K-150K)!
Our Budget Rooms start from just PKR 2,000 per night! They include Free WiFi, AC, TV, and attached bathroom. Perfect for budget-conscious travelers!

Experience ultimate luxury in our Royal Suites (PKR 100K-150K) or Presidential Suites (PKR 50K-100K)! Features include multiple bedrooms, home theater, jacuzzi, 24/7 butler service, and panoramic views!
Our Family Suites (PKR 30K-45K) are perfect for families! They accommodate 6-8 people with separate bedrooms, kitchenette, family games, and kids welcome pack!
Our Business Rooms (PKR 20K-30K) are designed for professionals! Features include executive desk, printer access, business center, and meeting room access!
Booking is easy! Browse our rooms, select your dates, choose a room, and complete payment. You'll receive instant confirmation via email and SMS!
We accept multiple payment methods: Credit/Debit Cards, JazzCash, EasyPaisa, Bank Transfer, and Cash on Arrival. All transactions are secure!
Amenities vary by room type but include: Free WiFi, AC, TV, attached bathroom, room service, mini fridge, work desk, and more! Luxury rooms include butler service, jacuzzi, and private terraces!
Free cancellation up to 24 hours before check-in! Cancel within 24 hours for 50% refund. No refund for no-shows. Contact support for assistance.
Check-in: 2:00 PM | Check-out: 12:00 PM. Early check-in and late check-out available on request (subject to availability and additional charges).
Most rooms include complimentary breakfast! We also have on-site restaurants serving Pakistani, Continental, and Chinese cuisine. Room service available 24/7!
Yes! All rooms include FREE high-speed WiFi. Business and premium rooms get priority bandwidth for video calls and streaming!
Free secure parking available for all guests! We have covered parking for premium guests and 24/7 security surveillance.
Sorry, pets are not allowed in most rooms. However, service animals are welcome. Please contact us for special arrangements.
Yes! We offer airport pickup/drop services in Lahore and Multan. Charges apply based on distance. Book during reservation or contact reception!

Our rooms range from PKR 2,000 (Budget) to PKR 150,000 (Royal Suite) per night. We have options for every budget!
We offer: 10% off for 7+ night stays, 15% off for monthly bookings, special corporate rates, and seasonal promotions! Check our Deals page!
We offer special group rates for weddings, events, and corporate bookings! Contact our sales team at sales@hotelogix.pk for customized packages!
